entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bissett
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
